wikipedia_page.main: Maurice Wood (6 July 1933 – 18 March 1978) was an English first-class cricketer active 1954–55 who played for Nottinghamshire. He was born and died in Nottingham.

response: Maurice Wood was married twice. He had three children, Andrew, Patrick and Charity with his first wife, Marjorie and three children, John, Jane and Daniel, with his second wife, Margaret.
